txt.en: Hadorion has asked you to pick up the trail of a suspicious figure spotted leaving Barad Faen at night.\n\nThe trail should follow the western road.
Follow the trail left by the suspicious figure
The trail has led you to an abandoned makeshift camp-site. Search for evidence of use.
Follow the trail left by the suspicious figure
Follow the trail left by the suspicious figure
Follow the trail left by the suspicious figure

'This ichor... it is grotesque and foul in smell. A certain result of fell experiments. I've only heard rumours of such a thing... ghastly abominations roaming the halls of Carn DÃ»m.

'Of course, I have no experience with this, but my friend was so curious about the depths of that place he decided to venture there. Torvendor was his name.

'I can only assume that whatever lay waiting in those halls has now found its way here to us. I have a new lead.

'One of the townsfolk spotted a suspicious figure running off towards the western road at night. See if you can pick up their trail and follow it to whatever ends.

'I'll be here.'
Search the camp-site
Follow the trail into the tree line
The interloper dropped a strange looking cloth that should be identifiable. You should report to Hadorion.\n\nHadorion can be found in his home in Barad Faen.
Defeat the interloper
This shard matches. Keep following the road west
A witness saw a suspicious figure dart off following the western road during the night.
Hadorion has asked you to pick up the trail of a suspicious figure spotted leaving Barad Faen at night.\n\nThe trail should follow the western road.
Hadorion has asked you to pick up the trail of a suspicious figure spotted leaving Barad Faen at night.\n\nThe trail should follow the western road.

Hadorion has asked you to pick up the trail of a suspicious figure spotted leaving Barad Faen at night.\n\nThe trail should follow the western road.
Hadorion has asked you to pick up the trail of a suspicious figure spotted leaving Barad Faen at night.\n\nThe trail should follow the western road.
The trail seems to follow the road west. Keep going
You have been spotted!
'This sash, it is unlike the ilk of Corsair we see that typically trouble these shores.\n\n'Fortunately, it gives us our next clue.'
He was wearing a unique sash
Talk to Hadorion in Barad Faen
This shard is smaller. The trail keeps going
The smell is more foul on this. It continues west
This shard is quite large. The end is near
Follow the trail left by the suspicious figure
The trail veers into the trees to a camp-site
A Vile Trail of Bile
